uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx.ConfigurationManager

  • public class ConfigurationManager
extends Object
    Static Utility class to deal with configuration files. This class can be used to read/write configuration files as required by the bot.
